name: Wrong House
description:
You're Playing as a theft.  You found this house in your neighbourhood that looks like it's empty, so you decide to rob it, you enter the house but there's something mysterious going on here, it looks like someone else's in this house with you.

Controls:

Move: W A S D

Use: LMB

Alternative Use: RMB

Lighter: V

Run: LShift

Crouch: Ctrl

as a beginner this took me months to create so please consider donating to help me develop more games. Thank you

Various different SFX were used from www.freesound.org

Various different Assets were used from www.cgtrader.com

Various different assets were used from epic games content.

Various different textures were used from https://quixel.com/megascans/
